<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bristle](/Feats.aspx?ID=2835) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

**Special** If you have the [Barbed Quills](/Actions.aspx?ID=733) reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.
name: Bristle
